s: Few believe bells actually warn off evil. Yet they’re a great tradition, and a great way to remind fellow bikers why they need to stay safe. But there are a few rules. Hang it from the lowest part of your bike. Gremlins will be trapped in its hollow if they try to reach for your bike.
